attributes.action: do more to get more money to find ways to reduce the Carbon Dioxide emmisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: more should be done to reduce the carbon Dioxide emmisions, This effects lots of people,  skiiers and snowboarders,  diiferent adventourous.  Also it effects everyone because the polar ice caps are melting making sea levels rise making all beaches be covered over,  Also, it will reduce the amount of space of all countries as parts will be flooded.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
